pkgmetadata.longdescription: [data_algebra](https://github.com/WinVector/data_algebra) is a piped data wrangling systembased on Codd's relational algebra and experience working with data manipulation languages at scale. The primary purpose of the package is to support an easy to compose and maintain grammar of data processing steps that in turn can be used to generatedatabase specific SQL. The package also implements the same transforms for Pandas and Polars DataFrames.Currently the system is primarily adapted and testing for Pandas, Polars, Google BigQuery, PostgreSQL, SQLite, Spark, andMySQL.[R](https://www.r-project.org) versions of the system are available as the [rquery](https://github.com/WinVector/rquery) and [rqdatatable](https://github.com/WinVector/rqdatatable) packages.
